Text.text: This report will help you to receive:
1) Insights on your current SAP landscape and industry trends
2) Relevant SAP S/4HANA 1909 business scenarios by line of business
3) Tailored guidance and recommendations to realize the value from SAP S/4HANA
What we know about XXXXX (Client Name):
1) We analyzed business process performance and usage data provided from your SAP ERP, Non SAP, SLT and Central Finance system
2) XXXX no of central finance Functionalities enabled in the system in order to get data replicated
